name: horn-leech
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.x_y: The user drains the target’s energy with its horns. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user drains the target’s energy with its horns. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
